description: Led a team of 4 developers delivering 70+ high-quality interactive presentations for Pfizer. Automated the system for creating interactive presentations, increasing development speed by 400%. Designed a tool using AI for matching assets with similar projects. Created onboarding manuals to streamline product adoption.

Led an SEO and accessibility overhaul, increasing web traffic by 40%. Worked on a new version of jewelry buying website, boosting conversion rates by up to 10%. Co-developed a Typeform-like functionality with 200+ screens and. Conducted interviews and participated in code reviews.

Developed a real-time vehicle data logging system, reducing data retrieval time by 5 times. Refactored a social network project in 2 months. Implemented WebRTC for real-time video communication in an online consultation platform. Delivered technical solutions aligned with stakeholder requirements.

Built an event ticketing website in 3 months with a team of 4 developers. Developed interactive whiteboard functionality for medical companies. Integrated customer service chat, increasing leads by 15%.
